Ārammana Sutta：1．ārammana Sutta．-Some who practise meditation are skilled in concentration，but not in the object of concentration （ārammana），some vice versa，some are skilled in both，some in neither．S．iii．266．

2．ārammana Sutta．-Some are skilled in the object of concentration but not in the range of it，etc．（As before．） S．iii．275．
